panels.description: Avg block time is for the current subsidy epoch.

targets.rawSql:
WITH Epochs AS (
    SELECT
        "time",
        height,
        FLOOR((height - 1) / 2016) AS epoch
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
    ORDER BY
        height
),
EpochIntervals AS (
    SELECT
        epoch,
        MIN("time") AS start_time,
        MAX("time") AS end_time,
        MIN(height) AS start_block,
        MAX(height) AS current_block,
        COUNT(*) AS block_count
    FROM
        Epochs
    GROUP BY
        epoch
),
CurrentEpoch AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(epoch) AS current_epoch
    FROM
        Epochs
),
CurrentEpochDetails AS (
    SELECT
        (ei.end_time - ei.start_time) / (ei.block_count - 1) AS avg_block_time
    FROM
        EpochIntervals ei
    INNER JOIN
        CurrentEpoch ce ON ei.epoch = ce.current_epoch
)
SELECT
    avg_block_time
FROM
    CurrentEpochDetails;

WITH CurrentHeightInfo AS (
  SELECT
    MAX(height) AS current_height
  FROM
    cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingInfo AS (
  SELECT
    current_height,
    ((FLOOR(current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000) - current_height AS "blocks_until_halving"
  FROM
    CurrentHeightInfo
),
TimeUntilHalving AS (
  SELECT
    current_height,
    blocks_until_halving,
    blocks_until_halving * 10 * 60 AS "time_until_halving_seconds" -- 10 minutes per block in seconds
  FROM
    HalvingInfo
)
SELECT
  TO_TIMESTAMP(
    EXTRACT(
      EPOCH
      FROM
        NOW()
    ) + time_until_halving_seconds
  ) AS Halving_Estimate
FROM
  TimeUntilHalving;

WITH Epochs AS (
    SELECT
        "time",
        height,
        FLOOR((height - 1) / 2016) AS epoch
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
    ORDER BY
        height
),
EpochIntervals AS (
    SELECT
        epoch,
        MIN("time") AS start_time,
        MAX("time") AS end_time,
        MIN(height) AS start_block,
        MAX(height) AS current_block,
        COUNT(*) AS block_count
    FROM
        Epochs
    GROUP BY
        epoch
),
CurrentEpoch AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(epoch) AS current_epoch
    FROM
        Epochs
),
CurrentEpochDetails AS (
    SELECT
        (ei.end_time - ei.start_time) / (ei.block_count - 1) AS "Avg Block Time"
    FROM
        EpochIntervals ei
    INNER JOIN
        CurrentEpoch ce ON ei.epoch = ce.current_epoch
)
SELECT
    "Avg Block Time"
FROM
    CurrentEpochDetails;
SELECT "time", height as "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

SELECT (height / 2016 + 1) * 2016 AS "Next Diff Adjustment Height"
FROM cc_getblockstats
ORDER BY height DESC
LIMIT 1;
SELECT "time", difficulty as "Difficulty" FROM cc_getblockchaininfo order by time desc limit 1;

WITH CurrentHeight AS (
    SELECT MAX(height) AS current_height FROM cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingInfo AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        FLOOR((current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000 AS next_halving_height
    FROM
        CurrentHeight
)
SELECT
    next_halving_height - current_height AS "Blocks Until Halving"
FROM
    HalvingInfo;

WITH CurrentHeightInfo AS (
    SELECT MAX(height) AS current_height FROM cc_getblockstats
),
HalvingEpochInfo AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        FLOOR(current_height / 210000) AS current_epoch,
        FLOOR(current_height / 210000) * 210000 AS start_of_current_epoch,
        (FLOOR(current_height / 210000) + 1) * 210000 AS start_of_next_epoch
    FROM
        CurrentHeightInfo
),
EpochProgress AS (
    SELECT
        current_height,
        current_epoch,
        start_of_current_epoch,
        start_of_next_epoch,
        (current_height - start_of_current_epoch) AS blocks_into_current_epoch,
        start_of_next_epoch - start_of_current_epoch AS blocks_per_epoch,
        ((current_height - start_of_current_epoch) / (start_of_next_epoch - start_of_current_epoch)::float) * 100 AS percent_complete
    FROM
        HalvingEpochInfo
)
SELECT
    current_epoch + 1 AS halving_epoch, -- Adjusting epoch numbering to start from 1
    TRUNC((percent_complete * 100) + 0.5) / 100 AS percent_complete -- Manual rounding to 2 decimal places
FROM
    EpochProgress;
SELECT "time", height as "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

WITH epoch_details AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(height) AS current_height,
        MAX(height) % 2016 AS blocks_into_epoch,
        2016 AS epoch_length
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
)
SELECT

    (CAST(blocks_into_epoch AS FLOAT) / epoch_length) * 100 AS percentage_complete
FROM
    epoch_details;

WITH epoch_details AS (
    SELECT
        MAX(height) % 2016 AS blocks_into_epoch,
        2016 AS epoch_length
    FROM
        cc_getblockstats
)
SELECT
    (CAST(blocks_into_epoch AS FLOAT) / epoch_length) * 100 AS percentage_complete
FROM
    epoch_details;

options.content:
Bitcoin targets 10 min block intervals.  
A new block is mined every 10 min on avg.  
More hashrate causes blocks to be mined faster.  
Less hashrate causes blocks to be mined slower.

options.content: Hashrate is the compute strength of the Bitcoin network. Measured as hashes per second HS/s

targets.rawSql: SELECT height as "Height" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc offset 0 LIMIT 1;
SELECT  avgfeerate as "sat/vB" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc offset 0 LIMIT 1;
SELECT txs as "Txs" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc offset 0 LIMIT 1;
SELECT totalfee/100000000.0 as "Fees" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc offset 0 LIMIT 1;
SELECT total_size as "Block Size" FROM cc_getblockstats order by height desc offset 0 LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
    height, 
    TO_TIMESTAMP(block_timestamp) AS block_timestamp, 
    pool 
FROM 
    cc_getblockpool 
ORDER BY 
    height DESC;
select height as "Height" from cc_getblockstats order by height desc limit 1;

options.content: BLock rewards (subsidy + fees) paid to miners
